Restful API Tester.description: A web application to automatically test any REST API at regular intervals or scheduled dates. Application load handles 1,000+ requests running at 1 second intervals with minimal computational resources.

Javascript Sort Visualizer.description: A web application to visualize how different sorting algorithms sort things thorugh each iteration.

Javascript MPi Cloud.description: A web application to communicate over the cloud with any number of connected devices that will work together to perform a task. The mpi functions have a similar method signature to the C++ MPI implementation to ensure consistency when using my web application.
